medications.name: Paracetamol
medications.description: Pain reliever and fever reducer. Used for mild to moderate pain relief and reducing fever.

medications.name: Amoxicillin
medications.description: Antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections including pneumonia, bronchitis, and infections of the ear, nose, throat, and urinary tract.

medications.name: Ibuprofen
medications.description: Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to reduce fever and treat pain or inflammation.
